title: President Trump Is Fighting For Every Family’s Freedom To Choose The Best Possible Education For Their Children – The White House
content:
Fact Sheets			

		Education	

Issued on:
February 4, 2020
For decades, countless children have been trapped in failing government schools.  In my Administration, these children are forgotten no longer.
						President Donald J. Trump					CHAMPIONING EDUCATIONAL FREEDOM: President Donald J. Trump is ensuring our Nation’s children have the opportunity to fulfill their God-given potential.
